#+TITLE: Test Suite for Keywords

#+BEGIN_COMMENT :description Expected Scopes & Capture Groups:

* === Block Scopes ===
# The following scopes are applied to the entire keyword line.
- meta.keyword.org

* === Capture Group Scopes ===
# The following scopes are applied to the specific parts of the keyword.
1. keyword -> keyword.other.org
2. keyword name -> entity.name.function.org
3. value -> string.unquoted.org
#+END_COMMENT

#+NAME: Simple keyword
#+BEGIN_FIXTURE
#+TITLE: My document
#+END_FIXTURE

#+EXPECTED: keywordRegex
| Group # | Expected Value |
|---------+----------------|
| 1       | #+TITLE:       |
| 2       | TITLE          |
| 3       | My document    |

#+NAME: Author keyword
#+BEGIN_FIXTURE
#+AUTHOR: Example Author
#+END_FIXTURE

#+EXPECTED: keywordRegex
| Group # | Expected Value |
|---------+----------------|
| 1       | #+AUTHOR:      |
| 2       | AUTHOR         |
| 3       | Example Author |

#+END_FIXTURE

| 1       | #+KEYWORDS:    |
| 2       | KEYWORDS       |
| 3       | org, test, keyword, example |

#+NAME: Invalid keyword without colon
#+BEGIN_FIXTURE
#+INVALIDKEY This line is missing a colon
#+END_FIXTURE

#+EXPECTED: keywordRegex
no-match

#+NAME: Overwritten title
#+BEGIN_FIXTURE
#+TITLE: Overwritten Title
#+END_FIXTURE

#+EXPECTED: keywordRegex
| Group # | Expected Value |
|---------+----------------|
| 1       | #+TITLE:       |
| 2       | TITLE          |
| 3       | Overwritten Title |
